name: OnLevelSelect_6
_source: speak;Narrator;Eirika suppresses her feeling of unease and continues to search for her brother.{br}Passing through Serafew, the group crosses into the Grado Empire.{br}From here forward, there is no doubt that they are walking through hostile territory.;;;narration

speak;Narrator;In hopes of avoiding unnecessary trouble, Eirika and company head for a sparsely populated region of Grado.{br}However, it is too late. Their movements are already being tracked.;;;narration
